channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: OpenAI Will Lose $74 Billion the Same Year That Anthropic Breaks Even: Report
item.description: The money's all made up anyway.

item.title: Unitree robot dog with GPT smarts and 4D LiDAR vision gets early Black Friday deal - and it's cheaper than you might think
item.description: Unitree Go2 Air Robot Dog is selling on JoyBuy for £2,399, down from its usual £2,599 asking price.

item.title: ‘The Running Man’ Is a Fun, Fast-Paced Ride With an Unfortunate Stumble
item.description: Glen Powell stars in the new film from Edgar Wright, based on the Stephen King novel.

item.title: ‘The Running Man’ Conjures a Dystopian Vision of America That’s Still Not as Bad as Reality
item.description: Edgar Wright’s violent, incoherent remake is hard to view as satire in a world where right-wing narratives and reality-TV-style ICE raids dominate the media.

item.title: Pixel phones are getting notification summaries
item.description: Google is releasing an update for Pixel phones with an interesting feature in the mix: notification summaries. Apple notably had plenty of trouble implementing its version of this AI-powered feature, and Google is taking a cautious first step by deploying it only for chat conversations. It’ll arrive as part of this month’s Pixel update for […]

item.title: Google is introducing its own version of Apple’s private AI cloud compute
item.description: Google is rolling out a new cloud-based platform that lets users unlock advanced AI features on their devices while keeping data private. The feature, virtually identical to Apple’s Private Cloud Compute, comes as companies reconcile users’ demands for privacy with the growing computational needs of the latest AI applications. Many Google products run AI features […]...

item.title: Google Pixel update adds battery-saving maps mode, AI photo remixing, and smarter notifications
item.description: Google says the new power saving mode for Google Maps can save you up to four hours of battery life

item.title: These mini PCs got a big price cut ahead of Black Friday - and now they're all under $500 with the deals code
item.description: I've found some big savings on mini PCs over on Amazon right now.

item.title: How fast is your internet really? This new network service looks to solve speed debates for good
item.description: Speedtest Pulse is a new mobile device for ISPs and enterprise customers to test their networks.

item.description: It's getting harder to tell the difference between satire and reality.

item.title: Housing affordability is so strained that Trump is considering 50-year mortgages. Here are 11 things to know
item.description: The ResiClub team ran the numbers to better understand the math on 50-year mortgages. Here’s what we learned. Want more housing market stories from Lance Lambert’s ResiClub in your inbox? Subscribe to the ResiClub newsletter.

item.title: Big Tech Says Superintelligent AI Is in Sight. The Average Expert Disagrees
item.description: According to a recent study, the average expert doesn't believe in Silicon Valley's ambitious rapid progress timeline.

item.title: ‘Dune: Prophecy’ Kicks off Season 2 Production by Adding Indira Varma and More
item.description: Ashley Walters and Tom Hollander are also coming aboard HBO's prequel set 10,000 years before Paul Atreides in Frank Herbert's 'Dune' universe.

item.title: « Windows, c’est nul » : un ancien développeur Microsoft balance tout et il a une solution
item.description: Dave Plummer a passé des années à coder le Gestionnaire des tâches et Windows Pinball. Aujourd'hui, il ne mâche plus ses mots : Windows 11 est devenu un cauchemar de publicités, de télémétrie opaque et de paternalisme insupportable. Sa solution ? Un « mode Pro » qui traiterait enfin les utilisateurs avancés comme des adultes.

item.title: Threads targets podcasters with new features, aiming to become the home for show discussions
item.description: Threads is targeting podcasters with new features, including dedicated links in the bio and more visible links in the feed.

item.title: ‘This type of French is impossible’: Diane Kruger on how HBO Max show The Seduction isn’t a good omen for Apple TV’s La Décision
item.description: Apple TV casts Diane Kruger in new French drama La Décision, but one HBO Max show proves the language swap is already ‘a hard muscle to flex’.

item.title: Quel casque pour PS5 (ou PS4) choisir en 2025 ?
item.description: Vous recherchez le meilleur casque sans fil pour PlayStation 5 ou PlayStation 4, ou même des écouteurs, pour jouer à votre console dans votre bulle ? Voici notre sélection pour choisir le casque gaming qu'il vous faut selon votre budget.

item.description: Google donne une fenêtre de déploiement de Gemini sur les appareils Google Home pour le reste du monde, dont la France.

item.title: Paramount+ is making big changes in 2026 – and it’s not all good news for subscribers
item.description: Paramount+ warns subscribers of a 2026 price hike as it invests $1.5 billion in new content.

item.title: AI chatbots are helping hide eating disorders and making deepfake ‘thinspiration’
item.description: AI chatbots “pose serious risks to individuals vulnerable to eating disorders,” researchers warned on Monday. They report that tools from companies like Google and OpenAI are doling out dieting advice, tips on how to hide disorders, and AI-generated “thinspiration.” The researchers, from Stanford and the Center for Democracy & Technology, identified numerous ways publicly available […]...

item.title: Immortality startup Eternos pivots to a personal AI that sounds like you
